title: The world of exclusive hospitality comes together at loop
text:
Click here for information and nomination The world of exclusive hospitality comes together at loop 
Switzerland is known as the origin of exclusive hospitality. The world’s highest standards were set and still maintain and enjoy international prestige to this day. One of the oldest grand hotels in Switzerland is the famous Baur au Lac. 
Set in its own picturesque park, the Baur au Lac overlooks both the lake and the Alps and yet is only a few minutes’ walk from Zurich’s financial district and the world-famous Bahnhofstrasse shopping street. Discerning international guests value its attentive personal service, luxurious accommodation, sumptuous restaurants and magnificent banqueting facilities – and have done so for over 170 years. Following major renovations there are now 120 luxuriously appointed and individually decorated rooms and suites. The Baur au Lac offers the ultimate in contemporary elegance, evoking the intimate atmosphere of a private home. The elegant Restaurant Pavillon is internationally renowned for classic French dining and outstanding wines, awarded with 1 Michelin star and 17 points by Gault Millau. More information at bauraulac.ch 
Luxury places at Portugal’s beautiful Algarve 
The Martinhal Family Hotels and Resorts were born from the expansion of the “Martinhal” brand and concept, beyond the Martinhal Sagres Beach Family Resort Hotel. The essence of the Martinhal brand successfully brings together the elements of luxury, family, design and genuine hospitality. 
The Martinhal Sagres Beach Family Resort is located in a stunning position overlooking Martinhal Beach and set within a protected natural park, Martinhal Sagres is located close to the historic town of Sagres on the unspoiled Western Algarve. Featuring a five star hotel and a selection of spacious family homes, the essence of the resort is one of understated luxury and genuine hospitality. Stylish, contemporary architecture complements the organic personality of the resort, which has been shaped to blend effortlessly into the indigenous landscape. The facilities at Martinhal Sagres include a choice of swimming pools and restaurants (all family friendly with children and baby menus), gym, Spa, tennis and Padel tennis courts, kids club for children from 6 months up to teenagers and a wide range of activities such as yoga, surf hiking and cycling tours and much more. 
The luxury Martinhal family resort concept has expanded, with the exciting opening of Martinhal Quinta Family Resort in June 2015 in the prestigious Quinta do Lago area of the stunning Algarve. The management of “Europe’s leading luxury family resort” in the Western Algarve, have taken over the 4 star villa resort previously known as “Monte da Quinta Club.” “Martinhal Quinta Family Resort” will continue to be an exclusive 4-star private collection of independently owned luxury villas, offering 2- and 3-bedroom townhouses, and 3- and 4-bedroom villas – each with a private garden and pool area. In 2015, facilities at Martinhal Quinta include Raposinhos Kids Club, for children 3-8 years old, M Bar and Gelataria, Mercado Deli & Bake, Blue room, our game room with wiis, PlayStation, pool table and the stylish Pool Hangout with an outdoor playground that includes a trampoline, water jets, and more. Further renovations will take place during winter 2015, to offer more and better facilities to guests at Martinhal Quinta, from 2016 onwards. More information at martinhal.com 
Loop - the only luxury tourism trade fair in the German speaking market - was launched by the company Lobster Experience GmbH & Co KG three years ago and will take place from April 10-13, 2016 in Frankfurt. 
Luxury Hotels worldwide are welcome to participate at loop and liaise business with exclusive premium buyers in the German speaking market. 
Further information about loop, loop-luxury-fair.com click here. Oct 21, 2015
